definition[0]: a popular product, especially a book, that many people buy
example[0]: His new book went straight to number one on the best-seller list.
example[1]: The game is already a bestseller in Japan.
definition[1]: a very popular book or other product, that many people buy
example[2]: The book has been on the New York Times fiction best-seller list for more than 30 weeks.
